Value.label: Connected Load
Value.Help: This parameter defines the value of connected load. 0 Not configured (Default) 1-200 Watts connected load

Value.label: Minimum Dim level
Value.Help: This parameter defines the lowest dimming level of the dimmer. The value must be lower than parameter 3 1-98 Default is 20 (20%)

Value.label: Maximum Dim level
Value.Help: This parameter defines the highest dimming level of the dimmer. The value must be higher than parameter 2 2-99 Default is 85 (85%)

Value.label: Total steps
Value.Help: This parameter defines how many steps it should take to dim from minimum to maximum dim level (One round = 20 steps) Default is 15 (3/4 round)

Value.label: Double press function
Value.Help: This parameter defines the double press functionality.

Value.label: Switch ON level
Value.Help: This parameter defines the dimming level when restored from OFF state by push button. 0 Restores last dim level (Default) 1-99%

Value.label: Dimming Duration
Value.Help: This parameter defines how long it takes to dim to desired level. Note! Only Multilevel Switch Command Class is affected by this parameter. 0 Disabled 1-127 Duration in seconds (1 - 127 seconds. Default is 1) 128-255 Duration in minutes (1 - 127 minutes)

Value.label: Meter Report Interval
Value.Help: This parameter defines report interval for Power Metering. 0 Disabled 30-32767 Duration in seconds (Default is 60)

Value.label: Power restore level
Value.Help: Parameter defines initial dimming level after power loss. 1-99 (Default is 50%)
